original_text: They will forget their shame and all the unfaithfulness they showed toward me when they lived in safety in their land with no one to make them afraid.
korean_text: 그들이 그 땅에 평안히 거주하고 두렵게 할 자가 없게 될 때에 부끄러움을 품고 내게 범한 죄를 뉘우치리니

sentences.original_text: and all the unfaithfulness they showed toward me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나를 향해 보인 모든 불신실함을

sentences.original_text: when they lived in safety in their land
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자신들의 땅에서 안전하게 살 때

sentences.original_text: with no one to make them afraid
